text: @GovernorPataki @NYGovCuomo Their governor made the nursing home take the coronavirus people so that would make nore people die. Then he told the nursing homes & funeral homes as well they must sign the death certificate death by coronavirus so he can get more money from the government. Corrupt.Very corrupt
